Description: Can we use Disprin or Compral pils when we have Corona. They dont contain ibuprophen?
DialogueText:
Patient:
Can we use Disprin or Compral pils when we have Corona. They dont contain ibuprophen?
Doctor:
In brief:   Yes you can,depends.   Corona Virus treatment so far is symptomatic and supportive.    It really depends what you treat with Disprin/Compral.You are they do not have Ibuprofen.  Would you like to video or text chat with me?
